channel.title: Open Finance on CEO Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in Open Finance on CEO Playbook

item.title: The Future of Finance: All About Embedded, Open, and Decentralized Finance
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: An overview of how Embedded, Open, and Decentralized Finance are converging to reshape the global financial landscape.

item.title: xpanse
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: API-first platform that standardizes and aggregates financial services, allowing developers, banks, and fintechs to launch banking, identity, and payment products with a single integration.
